entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: Nearly Headless Nick is a ghost who stopped in his tracks and spoke to Harry. He mentioned that it was like stepping through an icy shower when Harry walked right through him.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry Potter is the main character who walked through Nearly Headless Nick and received an invitation to his Deathday Party.

entities.name: mr weasley
entities.description: Mr Weasley is a friend of Harry's who was mentioned as being welcome to attend Nearly Headless Nick's party.

entities.name: miss granger
entities.description: Miss Granger is a friend of Harry's who was mentioned as being welcome to attend Nearly Headless Nick's party.

relationships.description: Nearly Headless Nick invited Harry Potter to his Deathday Party, which would be held in one of the roomier dungeons.
Nearly Headless Nick mentioned that Mr Weasley and Miss Granger were welcome to attend his party.
Nearly Headless Nick mentioned that Mr Weasley and Miss Granger were welcome to attend his party.
